title: Eleven Years On
description: When she was thirteen, Jillian Schmidt’s bitter mother dragged her far away from her father, friends, and home. Now grown up, Jillian still struggles with the broken heart the move caused. Why did no one ever contact her? Why did her first love forget her so quickly? Jill’s father’s death forces her to return to Hadleysville, ripping the scab off the finally healing wound.Toby Archer, attorney at law, finds himself in the unique position of handling the estate for Jillian’s father. He will have to face her with professional aplomb. If she had any feelings for him, she would have been in touch. But one look at her grown-up beauty sends his good intentions out the window and reminds him why he still misses Jillian Eleven Years On.
author: Kate Richards
